/Anna B.

comment.author: 71055001@N06
comment._content:
I believe that "tegn" in this instance is referring to the person's character.  Danish: "karakter, tegn" means just that, "Character". The aggregate of features and traits that form the individual nature of some person or thing. 

So in this case it would translate to: "Utlage raised this stone in memory of Öjvind, a person of very good character."
